ul.li: ‚úì Paper Bale Exists - Go to: Operations > Paper Recycling > Paper Bales
‚úì Storage Locations - Go to: Configuration > Locations (staging, warehouse, loading dock)
‚úì Warehouse Layout - Map storage zones with location codes (ZONE-A-01, ZONE-B-12)

ol.li: Movement records auto-create when bale location changes
Initial Movement: Bale weighing creates first record (NULL ‚Üí Staging Area)
Storage Movement: Assign to warehouse location after inspection (Staging ‚Üí ZONE-A-12)
Loading Dock Movement: Move to loading dock when shipment ready (ZONE-A-12 ‚Üí Loading Dock 3)
Truck Loading: Final movement when loaded on truck (Loading Dock 3 ‚Üí In Transit)
Each movement logs: From Location, To Location, User, Timestamp
GPS coordinates captured if mobile device used for warehouse moves
System tracks dwell time at each location (hours/days)
Alerts trigger if bale sits in one location > 30 days (stagnant inventory)

ul.li: Step 1: NULL ‚Üí Staging Area (bale created + weighed)
Step 2: Staging Area ‚Üí Inspection Zone (quality check)
Step 3: Inspection Zone ‚Üí Warehouse ZONE-A-12 (pass inspection, store)
Step 4: Warehouse ZONE-A-12 ‚Üí Loading Dock 3 (shipment scheduled)
Filter by Bale ID to see complete movement history of single bale
Filter by From Location to find all bales leaving specific zone
Filter by To Location to see what's arriving at a warehouse section
Filter by User to audit which employee moved which bales
Filter by Date Range to analyze movements during specific period
Group by To Location to see current inventory distribution across zones

field.p:
üöÄ Key Features:
‚Ä¢ Automatic Creation: Triggers fire on every bale location change
‚Ä¢ Complete Audit Trail: Immutable log for compliance and dispute resolution
‚Ä¢ Dwell Time Analytics: Calculate hours/days at each location for efficiency analysis
‚Ä¢ GPS Integration: Capture coordinates for physical location verification
‚Ä¢ Stagnation Alerts: Flag bales not moved in 30+ days for inventory cleanup
‚Ä¢ User Accountability: Every movement tied to employee ID for error tracking
‚Ä¢ Transit Time Reporting: Average time from weighing to shipment by grade

üí° Pro Tips:
‚Ä¢ Review dwell time report weekly - long dwell indicates inventory bottlenecks
‚Ä¢ Use Group by To Location to visualize current warehouse space utilization
‚Ä¢ Filter by today to see all movements for daily operations audit
‚Ä¢ Export movement history for customer proof of bale handling dates
‚Ä¢ Check User filter if investigating damaged bales - identify handler
